content:
1) If the user has fewer than 3 guesses,

and tries to request help anyway,

what message should the program display?

I did not find an example of this in the appendix.

2) If the user has 3 guesses and asks for help,

but the word is not completely revealed,

do they lose the game? Or should this not be allowed?

Thank you!
subject: Trying to get help without enough guesses / using up the last 3 guesses on help

content:
1) I believe you can find an example of that here: https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/fall22/psets/1_pset2#:~:text=continue%20the%20gameplay.-,example

2) if the user has exactly 3 guesses left, they can definitely ask for help, but if the word is not completed, they will lose.
